doc:
Miriam Margolyes https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Miriam_Margolyes 0 Miriam Margolyes (; born 18 May 1941) is a British-Australian actress and voice artist. Her earliest roles were in theatre and after several supporting roles in film and television she won a BAFTA Award for her role in The Age of Innocence (1993) and went on to take the role of Professor Sprout in the Harry Potter film series. For many years she has divided her time between England and Australia, and she has starred in productions in both countries, including the Australian premiere of the 2013 play I'll Eat You Last. In 2013, she became an Australian citizen, thereby holding dual British and Australian citizenship. Miriam_Margolyes ( ; born_18_May_1941 ) is a_British-Australian_actress_and_voice_artist . Her_earliest_roles were in theatre and after several_supporting_roles in film_and_television she won a_BAFTA_Award for her_role in The_Age of Innocence_(_1993_) and went on to_take the_role of Professor_Sprout in the_Harry_Potter_film_series . For many_years she has_divided her_time between England_and_Australia , and she has_starred in productions in both_countries , including the_Australian_premiere of the_2013_play I 'll_Eat You Last . In 2013 , she became an_Australian_citizen , thereby holding dual_British_and_Australian_citizenship .
